title: League Displays stops working after putting computer to sleep?
body:
I noticed after I put my computer to sleep and wake it my backgrounds don't switch anymore. I have to go back into the program and press finalize again for them to start switching.

Is this a known bug?

replies.body: Double check your general pc screensaver settings as those can have an effect on the League displays as well. If it doesn't seem to want to work at all, reach out to our techs in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to see if they can walk you through some steps to get that working correctly.
